item.title: Jade Transmit 008
item.description: When the world offers shallow tribes, build your own council of fire.

item.title: Jade Transmit 007
item.description: The truth I used to reject — and the power I gained by accepting it.

item.title: Seduction as Strategy — The Fire Behind the Throne
item.description: A tactical exploration of seduction, presence, and psychological leverage — where desire becomes fuel and dominance takes many forms.

item.title: The Art of Tactical Surrender
item.description: Tactical surrender isn’t weakness—it’s supremacy, disguised in silk. This Codex entry reveals the fire-forged truth of yielding with purpose.

item.title: Jade.Transmit.001
item.description: Clarity is a weapon. Most people wield fog.

item.title: Jade.Transmit.002
item.description: When the fog creeps in, I don't retreat — I recalibrate.

item.title: Jade.Transmit.003
item.description: I don’t chase momentum. I build gravity.

item.title: Jade.Transmit.004
item.description: Most people call it burnout. I call it signal loss.

item.title: Jade.Transmit.005
item.description: Sobriety isn’t just absence — it’s ignition.

item.title: Jade.Transmit.006
item.description: Direction is fire. Forgiveness is release. And the system is a casino with loaded dice.

item.title: Manifesto
item.description: The Strategivist Codex — a declaration of fire, reason, and ruthless clarity.

item.title: Philosophy
item.description: The Strategivist Codex: Our foundation of fire, reason, and ruthless clarity.

item.title: Reason is the Flame
item.description: The foundation of all Strategivist thought — not a belief, but a force of nature.

item.title: Selfishness Is Clean Ethics
item.description: The word they corrupted. The virtue we reclaim.

item.title: You Are Not Prometheus
item.description: You are not here to be chained for your gifts. You are here to wield them.
